meanings.definition: To make or become Arabic in character or style.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant arabized its menu by adding traditional Arabic dishes.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the architecture of the city arabized, incorporating Arabic design elements.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show arabized when the models unexpectedly started belly dancing down the runway.
meanings.sent4: Her music taste slowly arabized, favoring Arabic melodies and rhythms.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition was truly arabized with vibrant Arabic calligraphy and motifs.

meanings.definition: To adapt or conform to Arab culture or customs.
meanings.sent1: She arabized her wardrobe by wearing a beautiful hijab.
meanings.sent2: The students arabized quickly, embracing Arab traditions during the cultural exchange program.
meanings.sent3: The office party arabized as everyone started dancing to Arabic music.
meanings.sent4: His speech arabized as he began using Arabic greetings and phrases.
meanings.sent5: The festival atmosphere was completely arabized with colorful Arabic decorations and music.
